fishyplots

This repository is a collection of plotting functions for the Pacific Groundfish Data Synopsis Shiny app, led by Zoe Khan and Callie Murakami.

The concept and code are heavily inspired by Fisheries and Oceans Canada’s annual Pacific Groundfish Data Synopsis Reports and the paper:

Anderson, S.C., Keppel, E.A., and Edwards, A.M. 2020. Reproducible visualization of raw fisheries data for 113 species improves transparency, assessment efficiency, and monitoring. Fisheries 45: 535–543. https://doi.org/10.1002/fsh.10441 [PDF].

This work also builds off of initial NOAA implementation from 2024 of the synopsis report concept by Chantel Wetzel and Matt Callahan.

Installation: 

# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("DFO-NOAA-Pacific/fishyplots")
